description: Sasha comes to us straight from the Casting Couch. Once we saw her CC shoot we knew she would be perfect for HT. Watch as she goes from being "just a local girl" to being a hot, screaming orgasm star. Sasha is local as well as being a lifestyle player who knows what she likes and knows how to enjoy it. Her memory may not be all that sharp during the shoot from what we put her through but she, as well as all of us, will remember this one for a very long time.
title: Sasha Lexing takes a beating in stride and then some
